application.factories.AlgorithmFactory module

class application.factories.AlgorithmFactory.AlgorithmFactory[source]

Bases: object

Factory class for creating algorithm configurations.

algorithm_config

A dictionary mapping algorithm names to their configuration classes.

Type:

dict

static Configurator_for(name)[source]

Decorator for registering an algorithm configuration class.

Parameters:

name (str) – The name of the algorithm.

Returns:

A decorator function that registers the class in the algorithm_config dictionary.

Return type:

function

algorithm_config = {'autoencoder': <class 'application.algorithms.autoencoder.AutoEncoderConfiguration.AutoEncoderConfiguration'>, 'cblof': <class 'application.algorithms.cblof.CblofConfiguration.CblofConfiguration'>, 'cof': <class 'application.algorithms.cof.CofConfigurator.CofConfigurator'>, 'dae': <class 'application.algorithms.dae.DaeConfiguration.DaeConfiguration'>, 'hbos': <class 'application.algorithms.hbos.HbosConfiguration.HbosConfiguration'>, 'knn': <class 'application.algorithms.knn.KnnConfiguration.KnnConfiguration'>, 'lof': <class 'application.algorithms.lof.LofConfiguration.LofConfiguration'>, 'lstmvae': <class 'application.algorithms.lstmVae.LstmVaeConfiguration.LstmVaeConfiguration'>}
static create(name, data_file, **kwargs)[source]

Creates an instance of the specified algorithm configuration.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The name of the algorithm.

  • data_file (str) – The data file to be used for the algorithm.

  • **kwargs (dict) – Additional keyword arguments to be passed to the algorithm configuration.

Returns:

An instance of the specified algorithm configuration.

Return type:

AlgorithmConfigurator

Raises:

AlgorithmDataNotFound – If the specified algorithm configuration is not found.
